title: Cu-doped ZnO/Ag/CuO heterostructure: superior photocatalysis and charge transfer
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29763-29773
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05989A, Paper

Abbay Gebretsadik, Bontu Kefale, Chaluma Sori, Dereje Tsegaye, H. C. Ananda Murthy, Buzuayehu Abebe
The doped porous heterostructure material was synthesised using the combustion approach. It has better photocatalysis potential than the separate constituents.
